original: Zakrisison, Gustaf Emanuel, bankdirektör, Vetlanda, f. 10/2/79 i Vetlanda av T. P. Z. o. Eva Karlsson. G. 17 m. Märta Sjöberg. Barn: Brita f. 17, Bengt 20, Ingrid 23. — Folk-högsk., hand:sk. Bankdir. i Vetlanda fr. 32. Styr:led. i Östra här. sparb. sed. 14, ordf. 33, nämndem. sed. 23, led. av styr. f. Smål. o. Ölands sparb :-fören., fd. ordf. i komm:fullm. o. pens :nd. RVO, Brand- o. livförs. A-B Skånes ftj :M, Jönköp. 1. hemb :förb. GM, MannerheimM. Zandén, Bo Valfrid Jean Sörman, direktörsassistent, löjtnant, Göteborg, f. 16/12/13 i St. Malm, Södermani. 1., av fd. stat :chef v. SJ J. R. Z. o. Valborg Sörman. G. 39 m. Majalisa Liljegren. — Avg:ex. fr. hand:gymn. 32, stud. v. hand:högsk. i Gbg 37-38, res :off :ex 40, genomg. final course v. The Royal Inst. of chart. shipbrokers i London 34. Utr. språk- o. yrkesstud. 29-31, 33-34. Tj :man i Red. A-B Transatlantic 35, tj :man o. sekr. i Réü. A-B Transoil 36, i Red. A-B Tankoil 37-40, rev. i div. föret., d;ir:assist. i Red. A-B Transoil o. Tankoil i Gbg fr. 38. Löjtn. i Hall. reg. res. Kamrer o. sekr. i stift. Wilh. Lundgrens minne, medl. i Naut. fören., Rydbergsgastarna m. fl. fr. 39. Hob-bies: konst, segling.
translated: Zakrisison, Gustaf Emanuel, bank director, Vetlanda, b. 10/2/79 in Vetlanda to T. P. Z. and Eva Karlsson. Married in 1917 to Märta Sjöberg. Children: Brita b. 1917, Bengt b. 1920, Ingrid b. 1923. - Folk high school, trade school. Bank director in Vetlanda from 1932. Board member of Östra härads savings bank since 1914, chairman from 1933, member of the council since 1923, board member of Småland and Öland's savings association, former chairman of the municipal council and the pension board. Holder of the Royal Order of Vasa, Brand and Life Insurance A-B Skånes ftj:M, Jönköp. 1st Home Insurance Association Military Medal. Married to GM, MannerheimM. Zandén, Bo Valfrid Jean Sörman, director's assistant, lieutenant, Gothenburg, b. 16/12/13 in St. Malm, Södermani. 1st, son of former chief of state J. R. Z. and Valborg Sörman. Married in 1939 to Majalisa Liljegren. - Graduate of trade gymnasium in 1932, student at the Gothenburg School of Business in 1937-1938, reserve officer exam in 1940, completed the final course at The Royal Institute of Chartered Shipbrokers in London in 1934. Language and professional studies abroad in 1929-1931, 1933-1934. Employee in Red. A-B Transatlantic in 1935, employee and secretary in Réü. A-B Transoil in 1936, in Red. A-B Tankoil in 1937-1940, auditor in various companies, director's assistant in Red. A-B Transoil and Tankoil in Gothenburg from 1938. Lieutenant in the Halland Regiment reserve. Treasurer and secretary in the Wilhelm Lundgren Foundation, member of the Nautical Society, Rydberg Guests, and others since 1939. Hobbies: art, sailing.

structured.name: Gustaf Emanuel Zakrisison
structured.description: Bank director, Vetlanda. Attended folk high school and trade school. Chairman of Östra härads savings bank since 1933. Member of the council since 1923. Former chairman of the municipal council and the pension board. Holder of the Royal Order of Vasa, Brand and Life Insurance A-B Skånes ftj:M, Jönköp. 1st Home Insurance Association Military Medal.
